Name: Percentage of SW-Reviewer Agreed out of all reviewer response activities (SW-Reviewer Agreed, SW-Reviewer Declined, SW-Reviewer Unavailable, SW-Reviewer No Response)
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Declined'

Name: Percentage of cases with at least one SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of SW-Reviewer Agreed compared to SW-Reviewer Declined
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Declined'

Name: Percentage of SW-Reviewer Agreed that occur after Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' out of all 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1'

Name: Percentage of SW-Reviewer Agreed that occur after Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' out of all 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 2'

Name: Number of SW-AE Assign Reviewers activities performed before first SW-Reviewer Agreed in a case
Metric: Number of 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' occurs

Name: Percentage of SW-Reviewer Agreed that are followed by SW-Awaiting EIC Decision
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' out of all 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Frequency of SW-Reviewer Agreed in variants that lead to SW-EIC Major Revision versus SW-EIC Accept
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' out of all 'SW-EIC Major Revision'

Name: Percentage of SW-Reviewer Agreed that occur in scientific paper review processes resulting in eventual acceptance
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' out of all 'SW-EIC Accept'

Name: Number of days between SW-AE Assign Reviewers and SW-Reviewer Agreed
Metric: the average of the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' filtered by the function ma > 0 where ma is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Percentage of SW-Reviewer Agreed that occur after SW-Reviewer Selection is now due
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Selection is now due'

Name: Frequency of SW-Reviewer Agreed in processes with multiple SW-AE Assign Reviewers activities
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' out of all 'SW-AE Assign Reviewers'

Name: Percentage of SW-Reviewer Agreed that occur without preceding reminder activities
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' out of all cases where 'Reviewer Invitation Reminder 1' does not happen

Name: Number of SW-Reviewer Agreed per SW-Initial Reviewer Selection
Metric: Number of 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection' occurs

Name: Percentage of SW-Reviewer Agreed that lead to SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' out of all 'SW-Awaiting AE Recommendation'

Name: Frequency of SW-Reviewer Agreed compared to RW-Reviewer Agreed in revised manuscript stages
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' out of all 'RW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Percentage of cases where SW-Reviewer Agreed occurs before SW-Reviewer Selection is 3 days late
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Selection is 3 days late'

Name: Number of SW-Reviewer Agreed that are followed by Assign a Different Editor or Unassign Editor
Metric: Number of 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' activities for cases where activity 'Assign a Different Editor' occurs

Name: Percentage of SW-Reviewer Agreed activities that contribute to rigorous assessment completion
Metric: Percentage of 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' out of all 'SW-Awaiting EIC Decision'

Name: Number of SW-Reviewer Agreed per case
Metric: Number of 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' activities
